short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces boring political words with narratives about Robots and Pirates

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For the next year in the US, we're all going to be seeing political headlines and articles on a regular basis online. For those who aren't deeply invested in US politics (and for many who are) the election language can get repetitive and tiresome.

Luckily, you can replace it with much better language about the ongoing struggle between Robots (Democrats) and Pirates (Republicans).  Additionally it fixes words for a few key topics like The Great Reckoning (Climage Change) and the Spooky Ghost People (ISIS).

It changes enough to keep it entertaining without making articles unreadable in their genuine context. It works on most webpages, though there are a few exceptions (like the Google search page). If you have any recommendations for future updates and fixes, feel free to email me at kyledouglassomers@gmail.com
